name: Portfolio Project
description: Website which shows off my experience
why: This project not only works as a resume for my experience but also allowed me to brush up on my knowledge of Angular and Unit Testing in TypeScript.

name: Dwelmer
description: Take Quick Screenshots similar to snipping tool
why: I needed to take many screen shots for a web security class. I wanted a method of just instantly selecting part of the screen to copy. The project also chalenged my knowledge of screen pixels and working with multiple monitor layouts.

name: Forex Helper
description: MetaTrader 4 program that buys and sells currency pairs
why: I love programming in C++ and got excited about playing around with forex stock strategies using MQL4 which is similar to C++.

name: RustProof
description: Plugin for Rust Compiler which verifies conditions and functions
why: Capstone project at Portland State. I chose to work on this project as it was one of the more challenging projects presented and seemed like fun. At the time there was not a lot of information on the Rust Language, which forced my group to find creative ways of learning how to create this plugin, like contacting the Rust Developers.
